dmca.title: Illegal webradio operation/links
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Indie Rock Music Show [mailto:indierockshow@gmail.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 24, 2005 1:28 PM
To: WebLicense@ascap.com; mchaney@bmi.com; griggle@sesac.com;
sglover@soundexchange.com
Cc: legal@theplanet.com
Subject: Illegal webradio operation/links

The website Vampirefreaks.com is running an illegal and unlicensed webradio
broadcasting operation in direct violation of the DMCA and applicable
copyright laws. The ownership information is included below with
webstreaming operations traced to The Planet Internet Services of Dallas,
Texas, USA. There are currently 24 illegal webradio operations running on
the website at http://vampirefreaks.com/radio.php also hosted on the servers
at The Planet Internet Services.

http://vfradio.com:2080

Node Data
Node Net Reg IP Address      Location            Node Name
  17   1   1 70.84.34.114    Dallas             
114.70-84-34.reverse.theplanet.com


Packet Data
Node High Low  Avg  Tot  Lost
  17   86   59   72    3    0


Network Data
Network id#: 1

OrgName:    ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
OrgID:      TPCM
Address:    1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Address:    Suite 110
City:       Dallas
StateProv:  TX
PostalCode: 75207
Country:    US
